Here's my vignette.

```{r}
library(nimble)
library(nimbleSCR)

5 + 6

calculate

dDispersal
```



```{r }
code <- nimbleCode({
    AC[1, 1] ~ dunif(0, 100)
    AC[2, 1] ~ dunif(0, 100)
    AC[1:2, 2] ~ dDispersal(S = AC[1:2, 1], lam = 1)
})

inits <- list(AC = array(c(1,1,2,2), c(2,2)))

Rmodel <- nimbleModel(code, inits = inits)
Rmodel$calculate()

Cmodel <- compileNimble(Rmodel)

Cmodel$calculate()
```
